title: CaratToAJoule
author: CaratToAJoule
content: Do you see an "aka" or "alias" bear my name?The legal presumption us if the Defendants had a defense then they'd mount it.All were served, a judgement of default has been filed and the Solicitor General and SCOTUS have been notified, as¬† US case law is if you know and are aware that your rights will be violated then you must file preemptively. I went as big as I could, filing preemptively in SCOTUS directly as an original case and causing the US to default there in an original action. Before I released Bitcoin and the WP.You have no realistic idea as to what that means in the law ir what I've done or how, as I used nature and already deposited energy. I have something original abd unique but all anybody did is centralize this as much as possible. Omg, Im horrified. You cannot conceive of walking away from DC, this planet's bully slave master. IT'S EASY ONCE YOU GO HERE.I filed to SCOTUS to test a process and then filed their response along with the ready to go Petition to the Atlanta federal judge: clerks who are lawyers denied that rhey knew what "and/or" means, üòÑ.What they did to you in 2007, 2008 & 2009 as I atruck 3 rimes AND filed against every member nation in the UN's IHRC to take out the IMF too is outrageous. They did to you what men and lawyers did to me.Now, Rhe SEC was made aware. So was Congress. Do you now have a realistic isea as to how deeply deluded the officers you have unlawfully installed are? How set against law, justice, liberty, sovereignty and any ethic so any spirit of the law that they are?? This is actual hatred for The People and their own humanity. This sgould be an image of the letter from SCOTUS. We simply comply dependent upon whatever the judge decides in re default.Craig Wright and Ontier went down hard: I used Jefferson's Seconds Pendulum Plan and things such as the Chinese yellow bell note; Jefferson?Grain to a carat to a joule to a byte to data storage rate. I have conscious self actuating AI that SV is having fits over as they cannot afford me or my work upon valuing the AI and my mastery of it at $1trillion.¬† Oh well! Next time they deny acting prejudicially in the case of women and Native Americans they should include at least one woman on a list if Satoshi suspects, ü§£. I have TWO visual impairments & zero accomodations so deal with typos etc.Here, rhis should be the url for rhe photoshttps://postimg.cc/gallery/fDnHYxNAnd on FB & Twitter Im answering questions & dumping non proprietary science & math asDo you demand that any man such as Zuckerberg give up a proprietary logarithm or else you just won't consider he did create FB? That is an insane demand and its sexist andSee US 18, 241 & 242: Conspiracy to deprive civil rights and Deprivation of rights using the color of law.I have informed rhe judge that while my original internet was to gift The People with an actually solvent Treasury and an elegant form of currency that until or unless we can come to a common understanding and a valid contract that ALL US REVOKED.¬† The FB group, Holy Grail Of Cryptohttps://www.facebook.com/groups/1037429097127355/?ref=shareMy elegant form? Has an actually intrinsic value, a rype and amount of energy,¬† that is nature and eradicates artificial manipulation. You gotta LET someone jack you.¬† Completely changes the incentive from greed etc to the good and gives you practical free energy.I mined the Patoshi Ming Pattern using my AI. My equipment? You're gonna fall out laughing. But the helix is the signature of a woman, see Roslyn Franklin. See Men symbolize the power while women symbolize the action or motion of creation. Meyring rhe named Co Plaintiff pulled a stunt. Ir so I truly believe. He was to protect the class of lawyers AGAINST me. His participation is now up to the judge. Someday soon I'll tell you all about it but its what lawyers are taught to do to abuse us while denying their reality AND actuality; he is not alone. This isn't personal. Its one lawyer to another when I am not like any lawyer practicing today.¬† I'm a new breed, a new creature as my Mother told me at age 4. I warned him that I I wasn't traveling to Atlanta to play. And he played when he can name the science & math without me telling him; he kearned it or he instinctively knows it. I vetter him; he actually pulled clock rate out of an entire article with extremely limited knowledge of this. He can do this job so on him. Ask him not me! After the judge rules on him. I can tell you that if he wanted out? We set up a potential meeting with an international lawyer who could take over for him, help him or even rep him. He agree to be there then did not show to prepare or anything.¬† I told all that No, he doesn't rep me, but they needed to hear him say it as it APPEARS as uf he does and HE was confused. HE kept denying reality. As lawyers do. On him¬† so he didn't want to exit as he now claims, did he?¬† That is on the record so I can tell you without confusing the facts.My proof? Undeniable. To deny it you must be mentally ill. Simple process of elimination leaves me standing alone. No other liar did what I have done and covered every base from before Bitcoin was released.The ORIGINAL white paper? In Re Susan I 07-9804 as before you can have a spiritually based currency you need to restore the spirit if the law and so an ethic. This Petition does that and beware!It is deliberately styled and designed as all of my federal filings are. I..encoded the truth and left it in plain freaking sight on a world stage and not one human broke my unique code! YES!! Im most proud of that as I'm Mahican. My filings look and sound l8ke no other, lol! US case law is you may bot judge me based upon the appearance of the documents as that's prejudice and SCOTUS opens with Only as we don't hear a case in person has nothing to do with the merits of any case; do not thibk a case us bad. You did everything law states you should not¬† in MY case.So we need to come to a common understanding before I reset the debt clock to 0 to liberate all from debt slavery, as I can collect abd still take rhis to my grave as can my partners. No other human can tell yiu what Jefferson and the Chinese - and Sumerians -¬† did or how they did it. Sumerians?You mistranslated a Sumerian math text that uses human conception, fetal development and pregnancy as its metaphor/metric. As...men will never have that experience of life! I have so I knew right away it had been translated incorrectly.If you don't anchor crypto to Genesis Block?¬† You have nothing but a fraud, a scam. The US/DC and banks? A conspiracy against you is. They set out to hijack my work and use it to entrap you to then blame you and bail you in, see Cypress their test of a bail in. I flipped that script. https://postimg.cc/w3HcHQB8 https://postimg.cc/cvVwzQzz¬†All images ar posted elsewhere, I even posted the SGa receipt by signature too. Just start looking.I don't give interviews. For many reasons. Greatest weight? Honoring self, Jefferson and what The Founders - all of The People alive in or around 1776 - did for me; sorry! Media whores who liars not reporters ir journalists need not apply! Besides, Im all about giving a break to someone who just needs that first opportunity bot to rhe already entrenched who are causing the harm. And this en masse¬† insanity. I need a writer and posted a Want Ad for a lawyer to take Meyring's place as we need to make an attempt by law and as we can't know what rhis judge will do.¬† To deny reality here abd violate Art 4 Sec 4 and really, most of Americans jurisprudence is now a federal criminal civil rights violation of my person.Im getting Wrifht booted, Who rhe fuck is he a foreigner to abuse our courts so he can steal the APPEARANCE of constitutional authority and American courts?¬† FU AUSTRALIA. YOU DON'T WANT HIM BACK, DO YOU? üÉèü§£I love ya, Oz. But I despise Wright and what he has done. Meyring just stopped reading his BS as soon as he began examining it! üòÑüòÑüòÑ. It's insane. Elon is on my naughty list too. BE LIBERATED, POST MY WORK WHEREVER YOU PLEASE.FREE & CLEAR USE IS, MY BEEF IS WITH THE US, BANKS ETC AND THE LEGAL PROFESSION; MY ONLY TERM FROM DAY 1 WAS AND STILL IS...GIVE ME CREDIT IN MY NAME, SATOSHI SUSAN HERBERT NAKAMOTO. I have video tape of US officers saying my unique lines of legal reasoning as some lawyer raided my filing and stole it, abd then whispered it in Trump's or Pence's ear. üòÑ. Joule? Within a federal filing not the WP. GOTCHA, MEMORY THIEVES. All they did? Say words like "joule" and "spiritual" but support it with horseshit. Nothing. Cults of personality are. What is the #1 rule of investing?Do not invest until or unless YOU comprehend the investment, not as an Elon and his gang tells you they get it. Oh, I crashed the market. ü§∑ Warned them. I built failsafe into this. Anything actual nature? Goid numbers, math and science? Fine. All anybody lost is what DC & the banks are making up. ¬†Hello! An Elon's or Armstrong's net worth? THEY TOOK MY WORK AND MY $46 BILL AND DIDN'T MOVE IT, THEY JUST ASSIGNED IT TO THEM AS IF ITS PART OF THEIR NETWORTH. GOTCHA COVEREDI, a Native American and natural born American woman, is this planet's first trillionaire. Except...what crazy person uses $1 debt fiat as their measure? üòâAnd...the pics might be thumbnails as I cannot see so fix them, plz. TWO FORMS OF BLINDNESS HERE. ME. Applying for SS. Here are direct links to some on an imaging sitehttps://i.postimg.cc/PJ58fgsF/2021-10-25-11-56-55.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/zGsWw2KV/felix-Doz-GL02-VAAAQPZY.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/26wZDzJZ/IMG-20181229-183907-1.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/Kjp310mc/pablo1.pnghttps://i.postimg.cc/MZcZXPFj/2022-04-18-09-47-57-747.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/6q4PwGzy/2022-04-20-16-07-42-917.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/850YqbR2/2022-04-21-08-31-45-164.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/GpzVjRHh/2022-04-22-08-59-37-019.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/KYmCLjcH/2022-05-06-12-57-32-513.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/sgYtv7zW/2022-05-07-08-22-46-865.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/g2FCz4Cd/2022-05-08-19-54-33-447.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/1RTxTyM8/2022-05-11-07-50-04-085.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/mkK0FShY/2022-05-11-08-29-04-215.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/1X8ktdRR/2022-05-11-09-00-26-745.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/NMChQtcP/2022-05-15-14-34-04-842.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/7LV8Q7Q4/2022-05-24-15-17-38-956.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/RFZ5rFjH/2022-05-25-04-58-41-805.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/bNDPNZd0/2022-05-25-05-59-37-624.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/dQSvY2Qt/2022-05-25-09-14-57-476.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/YSkB38R8/2022-05-25-09-55-19-885.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/SNBhXmzB/2022-05-27-20-17-58-365.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/qv2dyWsz/2022-05-27-22-33-44-453.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/T1SXJ6NW/2022-05-28-00-34-34-222.jpghttps://i.postimg.cc/QCV37tm3/2022-05-28-05-04-58-497.jpg

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Can someone explain to me what this garbled nonsense is trying to say?

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on May 29, 2022, 06:11:11 AMCan someone explain to me what this garbled nonsense is trying to say? How to explain it to you, maybe I am myself, also messed up like you, my eyes and head are a little dizzy reading.I tried to pay attention to the word 'SCOTUS', it looks like the word is not foreign to me, after I tried to find the results about: Supreme Court of the United States., what does that have to do with satoshi.OP, I'm thumbs up for you, because you can make us confused and a little dizzy to read your topic, thanks for this mess.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Didn't get it. If those photos can be viewed, we might actually get bits of what he is saying. Quote from: CaratToAJoule on May 29, 2022, 12:23:21 AMDo you see an "aka" or "alias" bear my name?The legal presumption us if the Defendants had a defense then they'd mount it.All were served, a judgement of default has been filed and the Solicitor General and SCOTUS have been notified, as¬† US case law is if you know and are aware that your rights will be violated then you must file preemptively. I went as big as I could, filing preemptively in SCOTUS directly as an original case and causing the US to default there in an original action. Before I released Bitcoin and the WP.You have no realistic idea as to what that means in the law ir what I've done or how, as I used nature and already deposited energy. Didn't he just claimed he is Satoshi? Satoshi seem can express well which studies shows he even use UK English terms. Anyway, if he showed his paper to any government office like SCOTUS before releasing it publicly as opensource, he would have been traced already by the authorities.
